CartoMix v0.15.0 — Spark

  • Signed Sparkle auto-updater with Ed25519 public key baked into the app.
  • Update Center in Settings shows auto-check status and lets you trigger a manual check.
  • macOS menu item “Check for Updates…” for native muscle-memory workflows.
  • Notarized & stapled DMG built on February 1, 2026.

Build: v0.15.0 (Codename Spark)
